name: Jinmu Empire
startIntroPart1: The Jinmu, pround and ferocious, live up to their name with their fearsome cavalry. So terrifying are their charges that few could hope to stand against them!
startIntroPart2: Will you be able to live up to their reputation?
declaringWar: You are in my way, and so, you are to be exterminated.
defeated: NO! How could I lose to the likes of you?!
neutralLetsHearIt: I will hear what you suggest.
hateYes: Hmph, I will follow this plan of yours for now.
